snippet: Israeli authorities said they suspected that the attack was carried out by a Palestinian who had broken into the settlement, Psagot, southeast of the Palestinian city of Ramallah.
abstract: Authorities suspect Palestinian who had broken into West Bank settlement Psagot of shooting nine-year-old Israeli girl in chest; several right-wing Israeli politicians seize on incident to call for halt in Washington-brokered peace negotiations with Palestinians.
lead_paragraph: Israeli authorities said they suspected that the attack was carried out by a Palestinian who had broken into the settlement, Psagot, southeast of the Palestinian city of Ramallah.

headline.main: Gunfire Wounds Israeli Girl, 9, Playing in Yard in West Bank
headline.print_headline: Gunfire Wounds Israeli Girl, 9, Playing in Yard In West Bank
